item.title: CloudNews 4.1.0 released
item.description: This release is fully updated for iOS and iPadOS 26 (required)
item.dc:creator: Peter Hedlund
item.content:encoded:
This release is fully updated for iOS and iPadOS 26 (required)

  • New Home screen widget
  • iPad window and menu bar support
  • Performance improvements
  • Bug fixes

item.title: CloudNews 4.0.2 released
item.description: This release fixes syncing with the newest version of Nextcloud News on the server
item.dc:creator: Peter Hedlund
item.content:encoded: This release fixes syncing with the newest version of Nextcloud News on the server

item.title: CloudNews 4.0.1 released
item.description: CloudNews is back with a completely rewritten version that has a fresh and responsive interface. And a brand new native app for macOS! 4.0.1 adds some important bug fixes.
item.dc:creator: Peter Hedlund
item.content:encoded: CloudNews is back with a completely rewritten version that has a fresh and responsive interface. And a brand new native app for macOS! 4.0.1 adds some important bug fixes.

item.title: CloudNotes acquired by Nextcloud
item.description: CloudNotes has been acquired by Nextcloud.
item.dc:creator: Peter Hedlund
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes has been acquired by Nextcloud.

item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.0.1 fixes a crash issue when creating a new note.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.0.0 released
item.description: CloudNotes 4.0.0 is a major update with focus on Markdown support. Easily work with unordered, ordered, and task lists. Additionally the support for formatting source code in Markdown is much improved.
item.dc:creator: Peter Hedlund
item.content:encoded:
CloudNotes 4.0.0 is a major update with focus on Markdown support. Easily work with unordered, ordered, and task lists. Additionally the support for formatting source code in Markdown is much improved.

This version also adds support for additional Nextcloud Notes features such as specifying which folder to store notes in on the server and which file extension to use.

With this release ownCloud servers are no longer supported.
